message.content:
Assuming you want to remove single quotes (' ) surrounding a text when pasting it from another cell in LibreOffice Calc, here's an expression that you can use:

=SUBSTITUTE(A1,"'","")

In this formula, "A1" represents the cell from which you want to copy and paste the content. The SUBSTITUTE function will replace all single quote characters with nothing (i.e., remove them), resulting in the pasted content without any single quotes. Just replace "A1" with the actual cell reference where you have your original content.
